captions.text:
>>AFFECTIONATE NICKNAME FOR HUSBAND ASKING
A QUESTION?

>>DISTRACTED AFFIRMATIVE ANSWER.
>>QUESTION ABOUT WHETHER OR NOT YOU'VE COMPLETED

A MUNDANE TASK?
>>DISTRACTED AFFIRMATIVE ANSWER.

>>SIGH.
FOLLOW-UP QUESTION ABOUT SMALL DETAIL OF THE

TASK TO PROVE THAT YOU
ACTUALLY COMPLETED THE TASK?

>>SUDDEN REALIZATION OF WHAT
YOU WERE TALKING ABOUT.

QUICK EXCUSE ABOUT THE SMALL
DETAIL TO HIDE THAT I WAS

BOTH NOT PAYING ATTENTION AND DID
NOT DO WHATYOU WANTED.

>>ACCUSING RESPONSE.
>>DEFENSIVE ANSWER.

>>LISTING THE TIMES YOU BEHAVED THIS WAY BEFORE.
>>WEAK EXCUSE.

>>EXPLANATION OF ALL I DO FOR YOU
IN A 24-HOUR PERIOD.

>>EXPLANATION OF ALL I DO FOR YOU IN
A 24-HOUR PERIOD.

PAUSING MOMENT WHERE I REALIZE I
DON'T ACTUALLY DO THAT MUCH.

>>ESCALATING TONE AS I STATE MY
DISBELIEF YOU DID NOT COMPLETE

THE SIMPLE TASK FROM EARLIER.
>>RAISING MY VOICE AS I REPEAT MY LAME

EXCUSE FOR NOT DOING IT.
>>TELL YOU NOT TO RAISE YOUR VOICE WHILE

RAISING MINE AS WELL.
>>CALLING FOR MATERNAL PARENT.

>>IGNORING MY FEMALE OFFSPRING AND EXPLAINING
HOW NAGGING YOU ALWAYS ARE.

>>EQUALLY IGNORING HER AS I GASP IN DISBELIEF.
>>YELLING FOR PATERNAL PARENTS.

>>CONTINUING TO IGNORE HER AND
BRINGING UP THE FIGHT

FROM THE SUMMER OF 2002,
WHERE IT WAS DECIDED THAT YOU

WERE ACTUALLY THE ONE TO BLAME.
SMUGLY INQUIRING IF YOU RECALL SAID EVENT.

>>RELUCTANT ACKNOWLEDGEMENT.
>>SPORTS REFERENCE, CONFIRMATION OF

POINTS RECEIVED.
>>FRUSTRATED GRUNT FOLLOWED BY A STATEMENT

ABOUT YOUR BRAIN CAPACITY.
>>ACCIDENTAL AGREEMENT.

>>PARENTAL GUARDIANS.
>>FRUSTRATED AND QUESTIONING RESPONSE.

>>ASKING FOR PERMISSION TO DO
SOMETHING YOU'VE ALREADY

RESPONDED NEGATIVELY TO.
>>EXASPERATED REPETITION OF DAUGHTER'S NAME.

>>FOCUSING MY PLEADING ON MY
PATERNAL PARENT AND CHANGING

MY PHYSICAL APPEARANCE TO REMIND
OF HIM OF WHEN I WAS A LITTLE GIRL.

>>STARTING TO SIDE WITH MY DAUGHTER.
>>NEGATIVE RESPONSE.

RESTATING MY DISAPPROVAL FROM EARLIER.
>>STATEMENT ABOUT HOW DIFFERENTLY I WILL TREAT

MY OWN CHILDREN SOMEDAY THAT
WILL NEVER ACTUALLY

BE REALIZED.
>>DISBELIEF THAT YOU WOULD TAKE HER SIDE OF

THE ARGUMENT OVER MINE.
STATEMENT OF FINALITY EXPLAINING I WILL NOT

CONTINUE THIS DISCOURSE.
>>INDIFFERENT RESPONSE.

>>BEGINNING MY BRISK AND DRAMATIC EXIT.
>>REQUEST TO STOP EXITING.
QUESTION ABOUT DINNER?

EVER

comments.text:
+Joshua Plyman
Equally offensive remark about your intelligence (or lack of) involving 
your closer relation to primates than the rest of mankind, and a racist 
comment about your mother that is completely irrelevant, all with too many 
spaces between letters, improper punctuation, and so forth. In short, doing 
exactly what I criticized an earlier person on doing in the first place. 
All doused in a healthy amount of profanity.

As long as you feel like, or until we can't think of anything. I'm running 
out of stereotypes.
